alerts.description: A warning email to the owner, when the amount spent has reached 050% of the request.
A warning email to the owner, when the amount spent has reached 080% of the request.
A warning email to the owner, when the amount spent has reached 100% of the request.

fieldUpdates.description: This is to update the discreationary line item status to "Closed" from "Pending Close" when site comments is not null
fieldUpdates.name: DLI Approval Status=Close

rules.description: Send Email alert to Discretionary Request Owner, when the amount spent has reached 50% of the request.
Send Email alert to Discretionary Request Owner, when the amount spent has reached 80% of the request.
A warning email to the owner, when the amount spent has reached 100% of the request.

rules.formula: and( not ISNEW(), or( Funding_Amount__c <> PRIORVALUE( Funding_Amount__c ), Spend_Amount_Percentage__c < value( ".5" ) ) )

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6 and 7 and 8
1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6 and 7 and 8
1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6 and 7 and 8
1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6 and 7 and 8

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6) or (1 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6 and 7 and 8 and 9)

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6) or (1 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 and 6 and 7 and 8 and 9)

rules.formula: and( text( Approval_Status__c ) <> "Pending Open", text( Approval_Status__c ) <> "Pending Close", not ISNULL( Funding_Amount__c), not ISNULL( Requested_Amount__c ), Funding_Amount__c <> 0, Requested_Amount__c <> Funding_Amount__c )

and( or( Req_Amount_Changed__c = false, and( Req_Amount_Changed__c = true, Funding_Amount__c = Requested_Amount__c, text( Approval_Status__c ) <> "Pending Open", text( Approval_Status__c ) <> "New" ) ), not isnull( Discretionary_Account__c ), not isblank( Discretionary_Account__c ), or( text( Approval_Status__c ) = "New", text( Approval_Status__c ) = "Pending Open" ), Funding_Amount__c = Requested_Amount__c , not isnull( Funding_Amount__c ) )
and( text( PRIORVALUE( Approval_Status__c )) = "Open", text( Approval_Status__c ) <> "Pending Close", not ISNULL( Funding_Amount__c), not ISNULL( Requested_Amount__c ) )
